meanings.definition: A visual representation or image produced by painting, drawing, photography, etc.
meanings.sent1: I love looking at the pictures in my favorite storybook.
meanings.sent2: She keeps family pictures on the wall to remember special moments.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the pictures on the TV screen.
meanings.sent4: His words painted vivid pictures of the ancient city in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes created beautiful pictures of nature.

meanings.sent4: Her words painted pictures of success and happiness in my thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her smile created warm pictures in my imagination.
